name: DroneRace:Prototype
description:
In this game, you travel through space with your spaceship to participate in drone races.

On each planet, you will find new components to modify your drone. These modifications will allow you to customize the style of movement of your robot.

It's up to you to find the right synergies between the modules, and to establish your strategies for each race.

To realize this project, I was strongly inspired by several games that I enjoyed:

-TrackMania

-Titanfall

I'm the only developer and I don't have enough modeling, graphics and sound skills to finish this project.

But the gameplay was on my mind, and I needed an excuse to work on my code for 3D in Unity, so there it is.

If you like the game, don't hesitate to leave a comment. It will motivate me to finish my todo list.
